A home.
A church.
A college.
A concert.
A daycare.
An airport.
A post office.
A high school.
A military base.
A movie theater.
A political event.
A neighborhood.
A middle school. 
A baseball game.
A newspaper office. 

Gun violence is an American disease. 

We must end it.
